title: Goat's cheese and butternut squash quiche
ingredients: ['1 packet ready rolled shortcrust pastry', '1/2 butternut squash, finely diced', '55g butter', '2 white onions, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 eggs', '4 egg yolks', '250g mascarpone cheese', '100ml double cream', "275g crumbled goat's cheese", 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives']
